member.name: T:DemoApp.API.StandardActionFilter
member.summary: NOTE: This class can intercept every request and perform global processing such as inspecting request headers or writing detailed logging. It currently justs logs the request and elapsed time.

member.name: M:DemoApp.TSAPI.Controllers.SurveysController.Surveys
member.summary: Lists summary information for all surveys.
member.response: The response body contains a serialized array of SurveyDetail

member.name: M:DemoApp.TSAPI.Controllers.SurveysController.Metadata(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches the metadata for a specific survey
member.param: The Id of the survey metadata to retrieve.
member.response: The response body contains a serialized SurveyMetadata.

member.name: M:DemoApp.TSAPI.Controllers.SurveysController.Interviews(TSAPI.Public.Queries.InterviewsQuery)
member.summary: Fetches some interview records for a specific survey.
member.param: The request body contains a serialized InterviewsQuery containing filtering parameters.
member.response: The response body contains a serialized SurveyMetadata.
